content.description:
This is perhaps the best boulder problem at Enchanted Rock.  It has it all: endurance, overhang, slopers, crimps, and a nice technical highball finish. 

  Sit start low on a sloping flake / rail and climb out using heel hooks and some long moves until the flake turns to a thin crack.  Pull some tough crimp moves to an obvious shelf.  Mantle and finish up the technical face. 

  There are some variations like dropping off from the ledge (V4) and starting from the ledge and finishing to the top (V2).  Strive for the king line, though.
content.protection: a few pads and a spotter
content.location:
Found on the north side cave of the Foxhole Boulder.   

  Plug in these coordinates:    30°30'38.44"N,  98°48'25.47"W

content.description: Follow 3 bolts up and slightly right to bolted anchors.
content.location: This route is located on the boulder that sits between Winter of Discontent (5.11) and The Mausoleum (5.12). Look for a large house-sized boulder with a big live oak tree growing from its base.

content.description: This is a short and powerful climb that starts on thin edges and climbs left through crimps to a dihedral.  Pull the roof and clip the bolted anchor.
content.location: On the west face of the Mausoleum Boulder up the hill from the Foxhole Boulder.    30°30'38.44"N,  98°48'25.98"W

content.description:
This is the little brother to Skeletons in the Closet(V6) and is a great lowball climb with unique movement.

 Sit start and either undercling or jam out the short roof to a strange and technical finish.

 May need to be cleaned up a bit since it gets no love.
content.location: Located on the south side of the Foxhole boulder near a tree.    30°30'38.13"N,  98°48'25.02"W

content.description: A top rope to the right of The Mausoleum.
content.protection:
Use the bolted anchors on The Mausoleum.  Watch out for a pendulum swing.  Maybe some sort of trad directional can be placed? 

  It is possible to scramble up the north side of the boulder.

content.description:
Large boulders populate this infrequently visited area.  Some of the best bouldering and some short routes reside here. 

  The two main boulders are The Foxhole Boulder and The Mausoleum Boulder.  There may be other climbs around so just have fun exploring.
